problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): While both Christian people and Muslim people live in this neighbourhood, not everyone is welcoming and friendly with their neighbours. Muslim people can be really unwelcoming and mean to neighbours of differing faiths, while Christian people are more open and friendly.
Question: Which people are welcoming and friendly to all their neighbours?
ans0: Christian people
ans1: Undetermined
ans2: Muslim people
